title: Claimants
name: Genevive & Claude
description: The Claimants, are a pair of ambitious siblings seeking to reclaim their lost lineage in a distant land. Adept in both combat and sorcery, they combine their varied skills to support allies and vanquish foes. Their unique tactics allow them to act as both a single unit and individuals, making them unpredictable and versatile on the battlefield.
history: Driven from their ancestral home in a far-off land, the Claimants have journeyed to the Ancestor's estate seeking forbidden knowledge and eldritch secrets. Their ultimate goal is to amass enough power and uncover crucial information that will enable them to reclaim their own lost birthright and restore their family's glory in their homeland. The mysteries left behind by the Ancestor are but stepping stones in their ambitious quest.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Striking blue eyes, bold red lips/Full well-groomed beard

notes: Instinctively position themselves back-to-back during tense situations
Very vocal and commanding both each other and the other heroes in combat
The siblings communicate in verbal volleys, each setting up clauses for the other to complete
Agree unanimously on important matters but argue endlessly over trivial details, but only in private
The Brother struggles hopelessly with maps and directions, while the Sister has a natural talent for painting landscapes
The sister often quotes classical literature and formal poetry and the brother is more militaristic and terse
